programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: A reformed thief is drawn back into a burglary-gone-wrong that lands him on death row, until he mysteriously wakes up in a psychiatric hospital.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A Chicago cop looking to avenge the death of his partner heads to New Orleans and kidnaps the killer's mistress by handcuffing himself to her.

programme.title: Suspect
programme.desc: Kathleen is an overworked public defender who needs a vacation. Instead, she is given another case with no ordinary crime and no ordinary criminal.

programme.title: Home Invasion
programme.desc: A botched robbery turns into a hostage crisis as a gang of armed criminals holds a woman and four children captive while police surround the house.

programme.title: The Razor's Edge
programme.desc: A WWI veteran is disillusioned by jazz-age values. He breaks off his engagement and goes on a journey that takes him through Paris and the Himalayas.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An American tank crew in WWII must contend with thirsty Nazi troops while crossing the Sahara in search of a fabled water well.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: The story of a man looking to redeem himself by saving the life of America's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing himself.

programme.title: Her Husband's Affairs
programme.desc: Advertising executive William Weldon (Franchot Tone) narrowly averts career implosion when his clever wife, Margaret (Lucille Ball), helps him save an important advertising account. But tensions run high in the Weldon household after William's fast-talking employer, J.B. Cruikshank (Edward Everett Horton), invites Margaret to work for him too. The cunning couple must compete with each other to write a campaign for Emil Glinka (Mikhail Rasumny) -- a mad scientist with an alarming new product.

programme.title: Pal Joey
programme.desc: Charming musical featuring the love triangle between a lovable but mischievous man and the two women who could change his life, for love or money.

programme.title: Baby the Rain Must Fall
programme.desc: After his release from prison, an aspiring country singer tries to go straight, but his dream of a singing career puts this plan in danger.

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: A butler becomes a king after a shipwreck.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Jim Leonard, a penniless aviator and airplane mechanic, falls in love with the wealthy Carol Owen while giving her flying lessons.

programme.title: Beyond Mombasa
programme.desc: A hard-drinking American travels to East Africa to find out what happened to his uranium-miner brother and find the parties responsible for his murder.

programme.title: Drive a Crooked Road
programme.desc: Auto mechanic Mickey must give up his dream of becoming a professional race car driver after he is fooled into being a chump for some gangsters.

programme.title: Gidget (1959)
programme.desc: Sandra Dee became a model for countless teenagers in the late 1950's when she played Gidget, a sad-faced youngster who doesn't quite measure up to the chesty, bikinied girls on the beach. Her mom's reassurances come true when two surfers start paying Gidget some attention.

programme.title: The Goddess
programme.desc: As a child, she was Emily Ann, a poor girl in the South with no friends and an ineffective mother. But as an adult, she's Rita Shawn (Kim Stanley), an actress loved the world over. Still, all the money and fame in the world can't buy happiness, and Rita is plagued with depression over her broken relationships -- first to a handsome soldier (Steve Hill) and then to a boxing promoter (Lloyd Bridges) -- and her lack of any emotional connections to anyone outside of her professional life.

programme.title: The Magic Carpet
programme.desc: When his parents, the caliph and queen, are murdered by usurper Ali (Gregory Gaye), the newborn Ramoth is delivered to the safety of his uncle, Ahkmid (William Fawcett), via a magic carpet. The adult Ramoth (John Agar) becomes masked hero the Scarlet Falcon. After tricking the reigning caliph into appointing him the royal physician, Ramoth learns of his noble birth and, with the help of faithful Razi (George Tobias) and beautiful Lida (Patricia Medina), he fights Ali and his wrathful minions.

programme.title: Miss Grant Takes Richmond
programme.desc: A bookie operating behind a real estate front gets pulled into the business for real when he hires a daffy secretary who thinks the office is legit.

programme.title: Walk, Don't Run
programme.desc: During the Olympics, an electronics expert learns his hotel room will not be available for two days, and is forced to share an apartment with a woman.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: A World War II classic about the violence, quarrels, and romantic intrigue affecting a group of soldiers at Pearl Harbor before the tragic attack.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Girl
programme.desc: Fired from her job as a switchboard operator, a daffy young woman tries her hand at door-to-door cosmetics sales only to get mixed up in a murder rap.

programme.title: The Silencers
programme.desc: It's up to secret agent Matt Helm to save the day when a megalomaniac and his dastardly organization plot to sabotage America's atomic missile system.

programme.title: No Sad Songs for Me
programme.desc: Upon being diagnosed with terminal cancer, selfless suburban housewife Mary Scott (Margaret Sullavan) makes the ultimate sacrifice: she decides to keep the unpleasant news from her husband, Brad (Wendell Corey), and daughter, Polly, to avoid devastating her loved ones. Instead, Mary encourages Brad's affair with a co-worker (Viveca Lindfors), and even grooms the other woman to take her place. But as Mary's illness progresses, keeping it a secret presents a considerable challenge.

programme.title: The Undercover Man
programme.desc: Determined Treasury Department investigator Frank Warren (Glenn Ford) goes after a ruthless mobster known as The Big Fellow. When a key informant is murdered, Warren pursues the gangster on charges of tax evasion. But, with a slick mob lawyer hampering him at every turn, and threats being lobbed toward Warren's wife (Nina Foch), the lawman's chances of achieving a conviction are slim to none. His only hope is that one syndicate bookkeeper will have the courage to turn state's evidence.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: The prince's quest for revenge becomes his undoing when his suspicion is confirmed that his uncle killed his father to win the throne and his mother.

programme.title: A Man's Castle
programme.desc: In this Depression-era drama, the gruff and homeless Bill (Spencer Tracy) decides to help out the beautiful, destitute Trina (Loretta Young). Trina falls for Bill, and they set up house together in a shantytown, but he longs to get out of New York City and hit the open road. When Trina discovers she's pregnant, Bill plans to rob a toy store with a shifty drifter named Bragg (Arthur Hohl) in order to leave her with money. But will the scheme pan out?

programme.title: It Happened to Jane
programme.desc: When a shipment of expired shellfish arrives to her New England lobstery, Jane Osgood decides to take a capitalist railroad tycoon to court.

programme.title: Criminals of the Air
programme.desc: An undercover agent is sent to a border town to break up a well-organized band of smugglers.

programme.title: Gidget Grows Up
programme.desc: When her boyfriend leaves for the Air Force without calling, Gidget heads to New York in the name of world peace and joins the U.N. as a tour guide.

programme.title: The Lone Wolf Takes a Chance
programme.desc: A former jewel thief (Warren William) is accused of murder after betting the police inspector that he can stay out of trouble for 24 hours.

programme.title: Good Neighbor Sam
programme.desc: A happily married advertising agent helps out his single neighbor by posing as her husband so she can inherit a 15 million dollar fortune.

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: When the idealistic young Jefferson Smith (James Stewart) winds up appointed to the United States Senate, he gains the mentorship of Senator Joseph Paine (Claude Rains). However, Paine isn't as noble as his reputation would indicate, and he becomes involved in a scheme to discredit Smith, who wants to build a boys' campsite where a more lucrative project could go. Determined to stand up against Paine and his corrupt peers, Smith takes his case to the Senate floor.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: In Colorado at the end of the Civil War, Col. Owen Devereaux (Glenn Ford), affected by four years of brutal bloodshed, orders the massacre of a Confederate unit, even as they try to surrender. Devereaux's friend and second in command, Capt. Del Stewart (William Holden), is the only one aware of the surrender attempt. Devereaux returns home to a hero's welcome and is appointed a judge, yet his irrational and angry behavior continues, affecting his fiance, Caroline (Ellen Drew), as well as Del.

programme.title: Massacre Canyon
programme.desc: A cavalry officer and two of his men set out to make sure that a shipment of guns safely reaches its destination.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: During the end of the Civil War, Major Dundee guards Confederate prisoners, Union deserters and ordinary hard-bitten criminals in a remote fort. When Apaches attack the fort and make off with three children, Dundee must set up a posse including Confederates, who face a choice between joining up or being shot. The feud between Dundee and Tyreen is also heated up by a sultry Mexican widow.

programme.title: The Palomino
programme.desc: Steve Norris (Jerome Courtland), the heir to a meat-packing fortune, has a yearning to set out and forge a path of his own. His rebellious streak leads him to the broken down horse-breeding farm of the bewitching beauty Maria Guevara (Beverly Tyler). Enchanted by this determined young woman, Norris decides to assist her in saving her business. But this enrages duplicitous rival breeder Ben Lane (Roy Roberts), who steals away Guevara's prize palomino in an attempt to cripple her operation.

programme.title: The Parson and the Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Anthony Dexter) retires from the outlaw life, fakes his own death and adopts the name William Bonney. Soon, William runs into Jack Slade (Sonny Tufts), a gun-toting stranger who is itching for a gunfight. Jack falls in with a group of thugs terrorizing William's town. The Rev. Jericho Jones (Buddy Rogers) exhorts William to defend the townspeople, and, when William's maid, Tonya (Marie Windsor), is beaten by the thugs, he grabs his pistol.

programme.title: The Return of Wild Bill
programme.desc: Wild Bill Saunders comes home to help his father deal with troublesome ranchers.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: The Outlaws Is Coming
programme.desc: Moe, Larry and Curly Joe (Adam West) bring their head-knocking, eye-gouging antics to the Wild West. When reporter Kenneth Cabot (Nancy Kovack) heads to Wyoming to stop the slaughter of buffaloes, he brings the stooges with him. There, they trade barbs with Billy the Kid, Jesse James and Wild Bill Hickock, while Cabot gets elected town sheriff. But they'll need some help from Annie Oakley (Mort Mills) when it comes to foiling the criminal plans of a land-hungry frontier villain.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: The Longest Drive
programme.desc: After a decade apart, a pair of brothers reunites to find their long-lost sister, who was kidnapped as a child and is now living with a native tribe.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: The story of Gen. Custer (Philip Carey) and the Little Bighorn is seen through the eyes of two of his subordinates (Joseph Cotten, Darren McGavin).

programme.title: Secret of Treasure Mountain
programme.desc: An Apache curse hangs over good guys (Valerie French, William Prince) and a villain (Raymond Burr) seeking Spanish gold.

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
programme.desc: Flaming arrows stop four ex-convicts searching a ghost town for their buried loot.

programme.title: Wyoming Renegades
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Phil Carey) and his girlfriend (Martha Hyer) cannot start over until they stop Butch Cassidy's (Gene Evans) gang.

programme.title: The Walking Hills
programme.desc: During a poker game in a Mexican bar, a group of men discover the location of a lost wagon train -- and its cargo of gold. To prevent one man from cheating the rest, it's decided that they will find it together. Among them are horse breeder Jim Carey (Randolph Scott) and rodeo rider Shep Wilson (William Bishop) ; like their cohorts in the treasure hunt, they share a tangled history -- Chris Jackson (Ella Raines), Shep's current sweetheart, is Jim's old flame. Greed and suspicion soon break out.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Phantom Stagecoach
programme.desc: A dispute between stage lines ends with a steel-armored stagecoach.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: A federal agent (George Montgomery) and two colleagues infiltrate a gang of gold-rush gold smugglers.

programme.title: The Desperadoes
programme.desc: Sheriff Steve Upton (Randolph Scott) is a devoted lawman who works tirelessly to keep order in his small town, nestled within the Utah territory. So, when Cheyenne Rogers (Glenn Ford), an old friend with a criminal past, rolls into town, Upton is immediately on edge. Cheyenne assures his pal that all that's behind him now. But when the town bank is robbed, Cheyenne becomes the locals' number one suspect. He'll have to prove his innocence to save himself and his friend's reputation.

programme.title: Mackenna's Gold
programme.desc: Apaches, townsfolk, a Mexican bandit (Omar Sharif) and the cavalry follow a sheriff (Gregory Peck) to a mythical canyon of gold.

programme.title: The Hellions
programme.desc: A small-town policeman (Richard Todd) stands alone against a family of outlaws in 19th-century South Africa.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: In Colorado at the end of the Civil War, Col. Owen Devereaux (Glenn Ford), affected by four years of brutal bloodshed, orders the massacre of a Confederate unit, even as they try to surrender. Devereaux's friend and second in command, Capt. Del Stewart (William Holden), is the only one aware of the surrender attempt. Devereaux returns home to a hero's welcome and is appointed a judge, yet his irrational and angry behavior continues, affecting his fiance, Caroline (Ellen Drew), as well as Del.

programme.title: Massacre Canyon
programme.desc: A cavalry officer and two of his men set out to make sure that a shipment of guns safely reaches its destination.

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: The victims must outsmart their cruel captors after an outlaw, and his gang kidnap an heiress, her nervous husband, and a rancher.

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men
programme.desc: Rancher John Stewart (Randolph Scott) prefers to to resolve problems without falling back on violent solutions. However, fellow cattleman Wick Campbell (Richard Boone) isn't so peaceful, and he hires a team of armed mercenaries, led by ruthless Frank Scavo (Leo Gordon), to rid him of any possible competition. After narrowly surviving an attack from Scavo and his men, Stewart has little choice but to fight back in order to save both his ranch and his family, including nephew Howie (Skip Homeier).

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to prison but allows his outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.

programme.title: Unthinkable
programme.desc: A police officer attempting to solve the murder of her sons fianc uncovers clues that force her to choose between her duties as a cop and a mother.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: A man kidnaps two girls in Oregon triggering the Amber Alert system throughout many surrounding states.

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: A teenage girl who sees her mother shot goes into hiding with a police detective who grows attached to her as she protects her from the killer who is hunting the girl.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: When her favorite foster dog is adopted by a high-profile furniture designer, an aspiring marketing designer fears he's only trying to help his image.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sisters manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny receives notice that his bar will close unless he pays $17,000 and his customers rally around him with a plan to save it; meanwhile Jay's hazing practices start to raise red flags.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny receives notice that his bar will close unless he pays $17,000 and his customers rally around him with a plan to save it; meanwhile Jay's hazing practices start to raise red flags.

programme.title: The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: Dumped by her boyfriend on the day he is supposed to meet her family, a woman asks her platonic male friend to masquerade as her partner.

programme.title: Meet You in Scotland
programme.desc: A Scottish poet mistakes a writers identity, forcing her to choose between new love or the truth.

programme.title: The PA and the Manhattan Prince
programme.desc: A personal assistant to the stars finds her heart entering precarious territory when her new royal employer arrives in New York for a masquerade ball.

programme.title: Love's Fast Lane
programme.desc: A viral video brings a female mechanic fame and romance with a publicist whos trying to make her a host on a popular car-enthusiast talk show.

programme.title: Romantic Friction
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a book cover artist posing as the author of a hit romance novel and the snooty writer who actually penned it under a pseudonym.

programme.title: Loving Every Minute
programme.desc: A watch that sets back time by five minutes, messes with Stephanie and Hunters budding romance.

programme.title: The Love Advisor
programme.desc: An executive assistant on a podcast looks to save her boss's career while dealing with her arising feelings for the journalist who can help revive it.

programme.title: The Love Issue
programme.desc: A beauty editor finds a fake boyfriend when her ex-boyfriend (and boss) gets engaged.

programme.title: My Mother's Stalker
programme.desc: A single mother gets more than she bargained for, when she decides to spice up her life by meeting up with an obsessive old high school flame.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Beth es una mujer a la que han acusado injustamente de matar a su marido. Todo el mundo cree que ella es culpable, incluida su hijastra, hasta que aparece Jerry, un investigador de una aseguradora que le da el beneficio de la duda. Juntos buscarn al autntico culpable...

programme.title: Family in Hiding
programme.desc: A woman who told the FBI of a murder she witnessed has her family placed in Witness Protection, but a rogue agent just may reveal where they are.

programme.title: Food for the Heart
programme.desc: After taking on too much with her meal delivery service, Lia accepts her neighbor Elis help.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: Lindsay and Will bond after agreeing the dating service that matched them has made a mistake.

programme.title: The Wedding Rule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends face the adventure of matrimony to inherit a treasured restaurant, unknowingly seeking their perfect match in each other.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori hosts a Bring it Back themed luncheon for her neighbors in Hidden Hills with the help of Teddi Mellencamp.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori is hosting a 90210 themed party and wants to create some classic Beverly Hills appys.

programme.title: Our Take on Love
programme.desc: A fashion designer and filmmaker unexpectedly find romance when they are brought together to plan a glamorous party at an old mansion.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: When her favorite foster dog is adopted by a high-profile furniture designer, an aspiring marketing designer fears he's only trying to help his image.

programme.title: The Single's Guidebook
programme.desc: A content creator making a series about singlehood meets her match in polar-opposite, Jackson.

programme.title: Planning for Joy
programme.desc: After clamming up during a morning show appearance, Hazel finds help from Theo, a handsome trivia host who gives her a few pointers.

programme.title: The Perfect Man(icure)
programme.desc: Katya partners with consultant Ryan to sell her manicure device at the upcoming Beauty Expo.

programme.title: Love's Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: The owner of a struggling market teams up with a celebrity chef to revive each others reputations.

programme.title: Love's Playlist
programme.desc: Music exec Amanda clashes with brand rep Sam at a launch party, unaware she already met him online.

programme.title: Fatal Memories
programme.desc: Two sisters face disturbing truths when one of them tries to help the other piece together what led up to the stabbing murder of their mother.

programme.title: Paid In Blood
programme.desc: When a powerful gang constructs Asias largest casino, it is challenged by a vicious Seoul gangster who is more than eager to kill his way to the top.

programme.title: Painted Skin: The Ressurection
programme.desc: Xiaowei searches for a freely given heart in order to become human.

programme.title: Bitcoin Heist
programme.desc: To catch the world's most wanted, an agent assembles a team of hackers to plan the ultimate heist.

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang and becomes close friends with its notorious leader.

programme.title: Crazy Fist
programme.desc: Years after retiring, a former MMA champion has no choice but to step back in the ring when his best friend dies under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: Dragon In The Desert
programme.desc: During the Tang Dynasty, Elder Huangfu fights a tree demon, sending two disciples back in time to stop its power-grab with a precious pearl.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: A humiliated police force foiled by a gang of daylight robbers tries to redeem itself by putting a hard boiled cop on the case with a lax moral code.

programme.desc: After being accused of murder, a martial artist goes searching for answers about his origin story and the unknown enemies working to destroy him.

programme.desc: An aging lord challenges his samurai to a grueling marathon.

programme.desc: After taking a case brought by a secretive woman, a private eye is drawn into a web of lies and death spun by people all seeking a gold statuette.

programme.desc: This children's classic follows a headstrong jockey and an English girl as they work together to turn an unbreakable horse into a champion.

programme.desc: Torn between their desperate need to be together and a desire for money, a drifter and the wife of a gruff roadhouse owner plot a doomed murder.

programme.title: Gun Crazy
programme.desc: Bart and Annie share a passion for firearms and money. Together, the two go on a murderous crime spree.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story

programme.title: The Asphalt Jungle
programme.desc: Unanticipated events and character flaws unravel a seemingly perfect heist.

programme.title: Dark Victory
programme.desc: When a charming young socialite is diagnosed with a potentially terminal brain tumor, romance blossoms with the dashing neurosurgeon who treats her.

programme.title: Ivanhoe
programme.desc: In a swashbuckling tale set in medieval England, a loyal knight risks everything to free his kidnapped king and win the honor of the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Long, Long Trailer
programme.desc: Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz take a big-screen road trip with a car and a Long, Long Trailer.

programme.title: Sweet Bird of Youth
programme.desc: In his quest to become a movie star, Chance will use anyone, but when he comes home, his good looks may not protect him from those he hurt.

programme.title: A Face In The Crowd
programme.desc: An Arkansas drifter is discovered by a radio producer and rises to fame on national television.

programme.title: Green Dolphin Street
programme.desc: In 1840, a man writes a letter to a woman to ask her to be his wife, but mistakenly addresses it to her jealous sister, who wants him for herself.

programme.title: Spirit of St. Louis, The
programme.desc: An aviator risks his life to complete the first solo cross-Atlantic flight.

programme.desc: As the Renaissance roils medieval France, the beauty of Esmeralda becomes an uncontrollable lure for four men.

programme.desc: In this swashbuckling classic, the legendary hero fights to rid England of the tyranny of Prince John and win the love of the beautiful Maid Marian.

programme.title: The Late Show
programme.desc: An aging, broke private eye investigates the murder of his former partner while taking on a new client who hires him to find her missing cat.

programme.title: It's a Great Feeling
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a pair of egomaniacal singing stars who can't find a director for their new picture have no choice but to take the helm themselves.

programme.title: Julius Caesar
programme.desc: A conspiracy to assassinate Julius Caesar ignites a desperate struggle for power in this adaptation of William Shakespeares tragedy.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After students use e-mails and text messages to organize a spontaneous gathering at a golf course, the body of a high-school senior is found.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team tracks the killer of an 18-year-old woman, an investigative aide for Alcohol Beverage Control who was monitoring underage drinking when she was murdered at a hip Miami nightclub.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The wife of a famous Miami ballplayer is found murdered in her home, and her philandering husband is the prime suspect until his corpse is found in the house too.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: As a tidal wave heads toward Miami, Horatio and the team must stop a gang of bank robbers who are trying to take advantage of the natural disaster.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man is found dead after an evening of speed-dating, and detectives immediately suspect one of his dates, but the focus changes when the team learns the victim witnessed an assault.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team probes modern-day piracy after six bodies are found off the coast of Miami.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: On July 26, 1983, police in Vero Beach, Florida received a report of a nude man firing shots at a naked girl on a residential street. When they arrived on the scene, officers found the body of a 17-year-old girl hidden in the trunk of a car.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: On August 8, 1973, police in Pasadena, Texas received a phone call from a young man who had just committed murder. He claims that his victim, Dean Corll, was going to kill him just like he had done to so many others.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: In the late 1990s, a string of disappearances in Rockhampton, Queensland left police searching for a killer they couldn't identify. The murder of a 9-year-old girl on her way home from school blew the case wide open when ex-con Leonard Fraser was arrested and convicted for her murder.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: When the body of a local beauty queen is found in a farmer's field near Sydney, Australia, the entire country is riveted.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Murdoc drugs and kidnaps MacGyver, Mac must escape and join the team to save Murdoc's next victim.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: The team's Halloween plans are interrupted when the vice president's son's plane goes down with a mysterious prisoner on board.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and the team attempt to extinguish a massive oil wellhead fire set by a rebel group in Nigeria.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver uses a heater and hot sauce to help a key presidential candidate in Ecuador receive a heart transplant he desperately needs after a rebel group tries to sabotage delivery of the organ.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A popular motivational speaker comes under suspicion when a conference attendee is murdered; Garcia is confused when Morgan doesn't want to attend a dinner honoring a family friend.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When multiple dead men are found, the BAU tracks a killer with ritualistic tendencies; Reid is anxious when faced with an opportunity to meet his mystery woman.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team tracks a suspect who shares the same style as a serial killer from 30 years ago; someone tracks the BAU's cases and replicates crimes.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: With the help of the BAU team, Reid tries to find his girlfriend before it's too late.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: As Reid deals with a personal loss, the rest of the team heads to San Francisco after victims are found in the Mission District.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When an author's daughter goes missing on the anniversary of his wife's disappearance, the team investigates the author as a possible suspect.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team heads to Austin to investigate when victims with watches set to inaccurate times are discovered; the team's stalker gets closer.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Victims of the Replicator, the BAU's stalker, turn up in Philadelphia; the members of the team think they are getting close to apprehending their suspect.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates victims who were sharing details about their personal lives and inner desires online; Kevin becomes jealous when he finds out that Garcia might have a new love interest.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When the team goes to Morgan's old neighborhood to track an UnSub targeting middle-aged men, Morgan suspects they are looking for someone connected to the man who abused him as a child.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A 25-year-old time capsule opened in a small Colorado town reveals a gruesome discovery and a possible connection to a local police officer's death.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team heads to Rapid City when two men are murdered in a ritualistic way; Reid mourns Maeve's death.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team heads to Los Angeles in search of a suspect who kidnaps nannies and the children they care for.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team tracks a suspect targeting people in Detroit; Blake receives a life-changing proposition from her husband (D.W. Moffett).

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates a series of deaths in Manhattan that seem to be related to ecstasy overdoses; Hotch makes a discovery about his estranged brother.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When the Replicator returns, a member of the BAU team is targeted.

programme.title: 18 Wheels of Justice
programme.desc: Chance is in the Pacific Northwest when he tries to help a con man who claims his wife was kidnapped.

programme.title: 18 Wheels of Justice
programme.desc: Chance becomes the reluctant guardian of a 12-year-old tomboy stuck in a bitter divorce battle.

programme.title: 18 Wheels of Justice
programme.desc: A couple hijacks the Kenworth T2000's load of televisions and leaves Chance to die in the desert.

programme.title: 18 Wheels of Justice
programme.desc: Calder is released from prison and resumes his search for Chance; Chance is reinstated as a federal marshal.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Walter takes a perilous swim to rescue a woman trapped in the La Brea tar pits; Paige's mother maximizes Ralph's troop cookie sales.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Team Scorpion encounters gunrunners while spending Christmas Eve at an electronics-free mountain getaway; Tim makes a decision about his place on the team.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is forced to freeze Cabe's body after he's seriously wounded by exploding shrapnel while on a mission in the desert.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is tricked into producing counterfeit cash for a foreign entity that intends to ruin the U.S. economy, Paige relies on her mother's skills as a grifter to save them.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Team Scorpion attempts to save a man stuck on the edge of a massive sink hole that could permanently destroy the Los Angeles water supply.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's job to find sunken treasure goes awry when Walter and Paige's boat explodes, leaving them lost in the middle of the Pacific Ocean surrounded by sharks.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Walter and Sylvester enter an international chess competition under cover on foreign soil in an effort to extricate a U.S. spy before her identity is exposed.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Happy, Sylvester and Cabe suffer from life-threatening, fear-based hallucinations after a simple mission to protect a vital seed bank goes awry.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a water main bursts at a cemetery, Brennan must identify and help reinter the remains that litter the grounds.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth suspects an organized-crime family when a partial skeleton is found encased in concrete, and he tries to lure the suspected killer out of hiding; Brennan gets a surprise visit from her father (Ryan O'Neal) while visiting her mother's grave.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brennan and Booth investigate a body that was found in a crater, evidence suggests that it had been in outer space.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Potentially radioactive remains emit a green glow at the crime scene.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate a small skeleton assumed to be that of a 10-year-old girl; Brennan's father (Ryan O'Neal) reappears in her life to deliver information from her past.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A skull smashes the windshield of a car driven by a group of teenagers on the freeway; a trail of suspects leads Brennan and Booth to a strange cannibalistic society; Cam suggests that Angela hire a private investigator to find her ex-husband.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of murders in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day "sinners". But who is responsible and why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to restaurant Wyvern House and its tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron. Secrets from the past surface and the killer strikes again - but the poison spreads wider than its intended target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in a reservoir dropped out of a plane, Barnaby and Nelson find the world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets. Are campaigners against the local airfield behind Bernard King's murder or does it link back to a tragic story from World War Two?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. They discover Eric Calder had more linking him to Copenhagen than just his famous Golden Clusters.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the Barnabys prepare for Cully's wedding, Lord Fitzroy and Beth Porteous are married in the pretty village of Bledlow. At the lavish reception at Bledlow Hall that follows, however, tragedy strikes - maid of honour Marina Fellowes is found murdered in one of the rooms by some of the guests. With their honeymoon cancelled, the Fitzroys must contend with a police presence in their home, as Barnaby and Jones try to learn more about the family history. It soon becomes clear there are secrets, deception, and an illegtimate son involved in the mystery, which is further complicated when the estate manager is killed by an arrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's a good day for the Hicks family, as the name of Tommy Hicks - who was executed during World War I for "cowardice and desertion" - is added to the list on Midsomer Parva's war memorial. Tommy's son Lionel and grandson Dave, mayor of Causton and whom Barnaby does not like (owing to dodgy building work by the mayor's company), are thrilled, but the snooty Hammonds are decidedly less pleased. Henry, the patriarch of the Hammond family, is particularly riled by his insalubrious neighbours, and has nurtured a long-running feud with the Hickses. But the evening after a battle re-enactment in the village, Henry is murdered - and Barnaby must delve into the history of the two families to find the killer, discovering a web of fraud, lies, and hidden truths.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are in Dunstan to investigate the deaths of a reclusive couple. As they try to establish whether Ron and Libby Wilson were murdered or died of natural causes, their attention is drawn to a dispute raging between a local builder and road protesters nearby. When another death occurs, the detectives learn that there are plenty of dark secrets and fierce hostilities in this apparently idyllic village. Will Jack Purdy's quick temper lead to violence? How far would the protesters go to prevent the bypass being built? And do current events somehow relate to the death of Michael Wilson many years earlier?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of Londoner Charlie Finleyson is discovered in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating employees at local Midsomer Life magazine. It turns out the dead man was married to the ex-wife of Guy Sandys, the wealthy owner of the publication. As the detectives become aware of a feud between Guy and the proprietor of the Morecroft Hotel, tensions are also heating up between the locals and visiting Londoners. Soon Barnaby and Jones find themselves to trying to piece together the truth about the murder, and learn that someone might be trying to conceal something in their past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are forced to take part in a team building exercise and Tom has plenty of problems dealing with the young, new, acting Chief Superintendent, John Cotton (Nick Fletcher). Following an explosion in a truck that had been stored in a truck depot, a body is soon discovered in a nearby lake, which turns out to be Alec Grainger, who had been seen arguing with James Parkes (Joseph Millson), the son of Colonel Matt Parkes (Tim Pigott-Smith). James appears to be involved in shady business deals and is blamed by his grandmother Caroline Halsey (Judy Parfitt) - and others - for the suicide of a woman he got pregnant two years before. Barnaby and Jones find themselves delving into a mixture of fraud, smuggling, and lies, trying to piece together the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When two couples vanish into thin air in the village of Monks Barton, Barnaby and Jones hear rumours of haunted woods and witchcraft. Barnaby remains sceptical of this, even when an unidentified body is found in a shallow grave and the missing start turning up dead. He soon has to determine if ghosts, criminals, or something else, is behind the abductions and murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. Yet the body of the mother of a deceased, one-time carnival queen, found in a stream, looks set to spoil things, as Barnaby and Jones find themselves digging up the past. From familiar faces, to drunken boasts and hidden obessions, it slowly becomes clear that the mother's daughter might be the key to solving the murder, when more deaths follow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Wealthy, eccentric and obese aristocrat Freddy Butler drops dead, shortly after gathering all three of his wives at Haddington Hall to make an announcement. Although George Bullard is adamant his death is from natural causes, the case is far from simple when Freddy's solicitor is deliberately killed in a house fire shortly afterwards and Freddy's will goes missing. Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating the extended Butler family, uncovering hidden secrets, illegitimate children and elusive treasure in the process.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Martin Barrett, a local council clerk living in Midsomer Worthy, is murdered during the night by shotgun, prompting Barnaby and Jones to find a motive for his murder. When they discover that Barrett was an expert blackmailer, his victims become prime suspects for his death - from a local pub landlord, a cleaner, a prominent member of the police board, to a former marine geologist. As they investigate, finding themselves drawn to the seaside, they slowly uncover deception, theft, attempted blackmail and hatred.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Broughton, a ninety-year-old battle of the sexes has often occurred, with men trying to oppose an event that the women have managed to successfully hold without interruption, until it culminates with casualties on both sides - Mildred Danvers, an elderly woman who had returned on the day of a funeral and poisoned in her hotel room, and Rev. Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers in Elverton-cum-Latterly are up in arms and divided, over the building of a supermarket. Things soon come to a head when independent environmental supervisor, Frank Hopkirk, is found stabbed to death at a Jubb's Timber Yard, the site of the new supermarket, by a pair of children. When Barnaby and Jones investigate to determine who wanted Hopkirk dead, they find out that he secretly came to the village under various aliases for sexual rendezvous with various women in fantasy role-playing scenarios, and that he had been making further investigations on the future development site and having doubts over claims it was contaminated. Either someone didn't like his investigations, or someone didn't like his sexual appetite, but either way, Barnaby finds himself investigating lies and more to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and DC Ben Jones (Jason Hughes) find themselves attempting to unravel the deaths of a choir tenor, and later a bird watcher, before more murders occur. The case is complicated by a rivalry between the Midsomer Worthy and Aston Wherry choirs, due to compete in an upcoming competition, and suspicions that an art scam is to be conducted, and soon Barnaby and Jones become concerned about a local woman, who they fear may become a victim herself. Particularly when it becomes clear the bird watcher had been photographing suspicious activity of late.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A few months ago, Annie Woodrow was arrested, accused of murdering her friend, Frances Trevelyan, on the motive of wanting Frances' husband. Her time in court has come, but DCI Barnaby is certain she still is holding things back in regards to the murder, and decides to monitor the trial. Yet a chance remark by Frances' youngest daughter, and a meeting with an old friend and psychiatrist, makes him begin to doubt the evidence for her conviction. Soon he and DC Jones, awaiting news of his promotion to DS, find themselves reinvestigating the case, and it soon becomes clear that they may have missed details that could implicate another in the murder.

programme.title: Super Sleuths - Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Murders team opens up about their experience of working on the popular crime drama and provides insight into the overall process of bringing it to the small screen.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The ghost village of Little Auburn has been abandoned since the war. When a young man is found murdered during its grand reopening, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Bleakridge Watch patrols the streets of their remote village, exposing anyone who steps outside the law. When one of their members dies, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter uncover just how far some people will go for power...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Tensions run high in Lower Pampling as a new type of cricket threatens a century of tradition. When a star cricketer dies during a tournament, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter's investigation draws them into a dangerous game with a surprise visitor from Barnaby's past...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When DCI Barnaby and DS Winter discover a dead body covered in live rabbits it reveals a sinister side to the local pet show. Is this a rivalry taken too far or is the killer driven by something darker?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young girl slips away from a Jane Austen weekend dressed in period attire, and is found stabbed in the woods, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter need to look back in time to find the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the annual Thassingham Classical Music Festival draws in big audiences, several musicians anxiously compete for the coveted Falconer Bursary Award. When the winner is brutally murdered and a priceless violin stolen, Barnaby and Winter's investigations lead them deep into a world haunted by a potentially deadly curse.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Undertaker Patrick Pennyman is found dead with his wrists slashed and suspicion turns towards a spiritualist church.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: During a regatta, the body of Rowing Club chairman Guy Sweetman is found bludgeoned and drowned. Bachelor Sweetman was prolifically promiscuous and jealousy would seem to be the motive.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The battle is far from over as logging's toughest season winds down; Jesse questions the future of the family business; rumors of a pullout abound for the Gustafson crew; the Pihl crew celebrates a good year; a Stump Branch logger quits.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As dawn breaks over the Pacific Northwest, this year's Ax Men prepare for the battle that lies ahead. Behind every turn, danger lurks.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The battle has just begun--and already, men are bowing out of the race.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Ax Men soar to new heights as a helicopter logging outfit enters the competition. At Pihl, Dustin tries to talk his father into coming back to work.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Rygaard, the bosses clash over greenhorn Brad. Meanwhile, at the Pihl team, Dwayne is forced to do the job of a greenhorn.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The mountain's men face the firing squad. Rygaard's greenhorn fights to keep his job, but the bosses may pull the plug before he gets his chance.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The mountain seeks its revenge. Weather traps R&R's helicopter pilot in the fog. Trees fight back against Pihl's timber fallers.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The tables are turned and the mountain's underdogs get their chance. Jimmy Smith finds the holy grail of underwater logs when he attempts to pull a dock out of the water.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Dead weight must be shed. Inexperienced hook tender Jesse Browning, junior pilot Steve Smith and greenhorn Brad Hewitt.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: New faces are welcomed to the fraternity of men known as Ax Men. Rygaard and Conner Aviation hope their new greenhorns fare better than the last class.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The gap between winners and losers is narrowing. Rygaard's new greenhorn battles to prove himself, while Conner Aviation's substitute pilot gets wild with the chopper.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The final week of logging's toughest season begins. Impossible goals leave no room for error, as each crew races the clock.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As the logging season winds to a close, the drama heats up. Conner fights off defeat, while the men of Pihl fight each other.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: It's the dead heat of summer and this season the stakes are higher than ever. From mountaintop to river's bottom, six crews will take on one of America's deadliest jobs.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As the summer heats up, so do the men of the mountain. Rygaard breaks in its greenhorns, while Jay Browning takes a gamble on a new yarder operator.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: After an ill-fated road trip, Jimmy and James Smith arrive in Florida to tackle the dangerous black water of the American South, only to realize they're in way over their heads.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The forest fights back, as a careless mistake at Browning threatens to take out DJ and Cody. At Rygaard, Gabe gives his greenhorns an ultimatum: shape up or ship out.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Logging country is under siege. Melvin's gung-ho attitude puts the crew in danger. Rygaard's greenhorns fight for a permanent spot on the crew.

programme.desc: The battle is far from over as logging's toughest season winds down; Jesse questions the future of the family business; rumors of a pullout abound for the Gustafson crew; the Pihl crew celebrates a good year; a Stump Branch logger quits.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As dawn breaks over the Pacific Northwest, this year's Ax Men prepare for the battle that lies ahead. Behind every turn, danger lurks.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The battle has just begun--and already, men are bowing out of the race.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Ax Men soar to new heights as a helicopter logging outfit enters the competition. At Pihl, Dustin tries to talk his father into coming back to work.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Rygaard, the bosses clash over greenhorn Brad. Meanwhile, at the Pihl team, Dwayne is forced to do the job of a greenhorn.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The mountain's men face the firing squad. Rygaard's greenhorn fights to keep his job, but the bosses may pull the plug before he gets his chance.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The mountain seeks its revenge. Weather traps R&R's helicopter pilot in the fog. Trees fight back against Pihl's timber fallers.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The tables are turned and the mountain's underdogs get their chance. Jimmy Smith finds the holy grail of underwater logs when he attempts to pull a dock out of the water.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Dead weight must be shed. Inexperienced hook tender Jesse Browning, junior pilot Steve Smith and greenhorn Brad Hewitt.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: New faces are welcomed to the fraternity of men known as Ax Men. Rygaard and Conner Aviation hope their new greenhorns fare better than the last class.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As the summer heats up, so do the men of the mountain. Rygaard breaks in its greenhorns, while Jay Browning takes a gamble on a new yarder operator.

programme.desc: After an ill-fated road trip, Jimmy and James Smith arrive in Florida to tackle the dangerous black water of the American South, only to realize they're in way over their heads.

programme.desc: Logging country is under siege. Melvin's gung-ho attitude puts the crew in danger. Rygaard's greenhorns fight for a permanent spot on the crew.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers travel behind "The Orange Curtain" to Irvine, CA. Jarrod and Brandi continue to be on fire.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Garden Grove, CA plays host to the buyers, and some international intrigue. Dave Hester may have raided King Tut's tomb.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers enter an auction marathon in Riverside, CA. Too many choices and too much heat make it hard for Jarrod and Brandi.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers roll into the city of Chino, California. Darrell gives his son Brandon a chance in the driver's seat.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to San Bernadino, Ca. Barry Weiss comes bearing gifts. Jarrod and Brandi go home with an attitude. Dave Hester piles up a nice profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers sail into Lakewood, CA. Dave bullies everyone. Darrell and Brandon buy a locker fit for a fiesta. Jarrod and Brandi find the news that's fit to frame.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers find some afternoon delight in Westminster, CA. Darrell's in his own neck of the woods.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers blow into Santa Ana, CA. Barry Weiss climbs aboard the buying express. Dave Hester may have trouble leaving the station. And one buyer finds something that's got magic.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: While picking in Pennsylvania, Danielle sends the guys to Bushkill Park--a century-old amusement park that's seen much better days.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: After years of begging Mike and Frank to let her go on a pick, Danielle finally gets her chance.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank visit a New York collector who's filled a train station with vintage cars, and although the cars are hot, the prices cool their engines.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank head to Ohio and decide to make the trip a little more interesting by bringing along a cup dispenser.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys stumble upon a staggering honey hole in Kansas; a couple's garage sale collection; Danielle learns that Frank's coin-operated motorbike is worth some serious money.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys intend to track down the motorbike that once belonged to Bonnie and Clyde; Danielle seals the deal on the mother lode of retro movie posters.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Former roadie Travis' home is filled with rock 'n' roll memorabilia; in Louisiana, the guys get fired up at the Bonnie & Clyde Ambush Museum; the guys uncover a killer collection of negatives and a bass with a potential link to Elvis.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Auctions take place in Lake Highlands, Texas--a wealthy suburb of Dallas. Victor Rjesnjansky snakes his way into Bubba's mind--turning him against Ricky.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to Tyler, Texas--a country town with a thriving art scene. Ricky tries to remove the "Vic fungus" that s invaded Bubbas head.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Carrollton, Texas hosts the auction. Moe and Mary debate their team name. Victor Rjesnjansky tries to blend in with some camouflage hunting gear.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers venture to Cedar Hill, Texas--home of the rich and fabulous Dr. Moe Prigoff. Jenny Grumbles tries to toast Victor for a locker filled with chotskies.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In Arlington, Texas tensions reach critical mass. Fed up with Victor's head games, Bubba vows to run the price up on his "Outsider" nemesis. Jenny Grumbles finds an item with some stimulating properties.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In the small town of Ponder, a dark secret looms; the townspeople pounce on lockers like hordes of zombies. Ricky and Bubba score some intimate objects for cattle. Jenny Grumbles scrambles for antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers ride out to the cowboy town of Mesquite, Texas. Mary Padian tries to impress Dr. Moe with a sleak, refurbished pool table. Jenny Grumbles uncovers a hot and steely garden item.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Walt Cade and his buyers hit the road to Austin, Texas--the capital of the state and home to a multitude of proudly eclectic weirdoes. Moe and Mary battle for an antique unit with an 8 grand payout.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Some buyers have enjoyed a successful first day in Austin, but on the second and final day, the Doc and the Junkster turn desperate. Not wanting to return home with an empty rental truck.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: On the hottest day of summer, the buyers return to the wealthy suburb of Lake Highlands, Texas. Victor Rjesnjansky gets burned by a mistake, but a surprise find leads him to the floor of the Dallas Mavericks basketball arena.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Looking for a competitive edge in the male-dominated storage auction scene, the Dazzler uses her feminine wiles to obtain inside information. Ricky and Bubba set their Texas land speed record. Mary gets a second opinion on a find that Moe considers worthless. Venturing where no women are allowed, Jenny uncovers clues to the secrets of a centuries-old secret society. Victor and the other men mock her methods, but Jenny demonstrates that force is often no match for flirtation and that a smile can open all kinds of doors.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Sparks fly in DeSoto, Texas, as Lesa Lewis and Jerry Simpson return from East Texas to make another score -- and this time, Jenny Grumbles and Mary Padian are ready.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Garland, a city boasting the slogan "Texas Made Here," hosts the auction. Moe and Mary find a rare piece of U.S. history. Jenny Grumbles, influenced by a popular book series, discovers items that may stretch her sensibilities.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers venture to the Dallas suburb of Addison. The Rangers make an antique find that Ricky believes has its origin on the high seas.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank visit a New York collector who's filled a train station with vintage cars, and although the cars are hot, the prices cool their engines.

programme.title: American Pickers

programme.desc: The guys stumble upon a staggering honey hole in Kansas; a couple's garage sale collection; Danielle learns that Frank's coin-operated motorbike is worth some serious money.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys intend to track down the motorbike that once belonged to Bonnie and Clyde; Danielle seals the deal on the mother lode of retro movie posters.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Auctions take place in Lake Highlands, Texas--a wealthy suburb of Dallas. Victor Rjesnjansky snakes his way into Bubba's mind--turning him against Ricky.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to Tyler, Texas--a country town with a thriving art scene. Ricky tries to remove the "Vic fungus" that s invaded Bubbas head.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Carrollton, Texas hosts the auction. Moe and Mary debate their team name. Victor Rjesnjansky tries to blend in with some camouflage hunting gear.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers venture to Cedar Hill, Texas--home of the rich and fabulous Dr. Moe Prigoff. Jenny Grumbles tries to toast Victor for a locker filled with chotskies.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In Arlington, Texas tensions reach critical mass. Fed up with Victor's head games, Bubba vows to run the price up on his "Outsider" nemesis. Jenny Grumbles finds an item with some stimulating properties.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In the small town of Ponder, a dark secret looms; the townspeople pounce on lockers like hordes of zombies. Ricky and Bubba score some intimate objects for cattle. Jenny Grumbles scrambles for antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers ride out to the cowboy town of Mesquite, Texas. Mary Padian tries to impress Dr. Moe with a sleak, refurbished pool table. Jenny Grumbles uncovers a hot and steely garden item.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Walt Cade and his buyers hit the road to Austin, Texas--the capital of the state and home to a multitude of proudly eclectic weirdoes. Moe and Mary battle for an antique unit with an 8 grand payout.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Some buyers have enjoyed a successful first day in Austin, but on the second and final day, the Doc and the Junkster turn desperate. Not wanting to return home with an empty rental truck.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: On the hottest day of summer, the buyers return to the wealthy suburb of Lake Highlands, Texas. Victor Rjesnjansky gets burned by a mistake, but a surprise find leads him to the floor of the Dallas Mavericks basketball arena.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Looking for a competitive edge in the male-dominated storage auction scene, the Dazzler uses her feminine wiles to obtain inside information. Ricky and Bubba set their Texas land speed record. Mary gets a second opinion on a find that Moe considers worthless. Venturing where no women are allowed, Jenny uncovers clues to the secrets of a centuries-old secret society. Victor and the other men mock her methods, but Jenny demonstrates that force is often no match for flirtation and that a smile can open all kinds of doors.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Sparks fly in DeSoto, Texas, as Lesa Lewis and Jerry Simpson return from East Texas to make another score -- and this time, Jenny Grumbles and Mary Padian are ready.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Garland, a city boasting the slogan "Texas Made Here," hosts the auction. Moe and Mary find a rare piece of U.S. history. Jenny Grumbles, influenced by a popular book series, discovers items that may stretch her sensibilities.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers venture to the Dallas suburb of Addison. The Rangers make an antique find that Ricky believes has its origin on the high seas.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep them selves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interview her cousin, JD. Willie is hesitant at first, but immediately hits it off with JD, who truly appreciates Willie's sense of humor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old GI Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier.

programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day.

programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image.

programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live.

programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots.

programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss."

programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival -- Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich for his Duck Diner menu, and enlists the help of the ladies to be his "taste testers."

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, when Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves, Willie signs Kay and Bobo up for a doggie obedience class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jep and Jessica move into Willie and Jase's neighborhood, Jep is sidelined with an illness, causing Willie and the Robertson family to pitch in and help Jessica get her new house ready in time for Jep's arrival home.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and the guys take John Luke golfing prior to his engagement party, their attempts at marital advice don't exactly work out as planned.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase receives a palate of fireworks as a gift, he and the guys create a homemade fireworks display for the Robertson family 4th of July barbeque. Meanwhile, Uncle Si is honored by the veterans association and given his own exhibit at a local military museum.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Phil and Jase get into an argument about which type of duck decoy works best, Jase and the guys repaint some old decoys, betting that Phil cannot tell the difference. Meanwhile, Jessica challenges Willie to a bowling contest with Kay's "Big Sista's" club.

programme.desc: When Jase and the guys discover they have a knack for removing pests from other people's property, they use their new talents to their advantage. Meanwhile, Willie gives Sadie and John Luke summer jobs at his diner, but first he must train them to be good employees.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Billy lands Asia a gig opening for a pop star that no one has heard of and things quickly go south once they arrive at venue, only to discover it is a 21 and over nightclub.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Asia is heading to Vegas for her singing and dancing debut at Planet Hollywood.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Its Billy's big chance to prove that he has the chops to take Asia to the next level, but a major meltdown from Asia before her first singing performance at Planet Hollywood threatens to derail everything they've been working towards. Meanwhile, it's decision time--will Billy stay, or will he go?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Anthony is determined to have full creative control over Asia's performance at the Long Beach Pride Festival. But after missing rehearsals, arguing with Shawn, and disobeying orders, Anthony is on thin ice. In a fraught rehearsal, Anthony drops the ball...and Asia! Facing possible injury as well as chaos on her team, will Asia even take the stage?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Choreographer Ricky Palomino has given Asia the lead role in his theatrical performance titled "Daylight Come." Shawn decides that this week he and Kristie are going to have a "kid swap" and Shawn will handle Asia's career while Kristie takes on Bella's responsibilities. Will Shawn be able to prepare Asia on his own?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Billy books a performance for Asia at R&B legend El De Barge's birthday. Shawn puts Anthony in charge of vetoing this performance if he feels that Asia is not ready. Anthony feels empowered, but Shawn ultimately pulls rank. When Anthony explodes in frustration, both the performance as well as his place on Team Asia are put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: With her Universal City Walk performance only one week away, Asia is set to sing her new ballad on the web series, BiteSizeTV. As the pressure mounts, she loses focus and spins out of control just before show time, when Gina confides in Shawn that she feels unappreciated, leading Kristie to explode at the crew and threaten to pull the plug on Raising Asia.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: The Ray family revolves around eight-year old daughter Asia's rising star, and this week there's a huge performance at World of Dance on the line.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies--the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive's sketchy associates and footloose ways spell trouble for Dog in today's hunt.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag" -- in this case a $20,000 bond. Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture. Dog gets special help from a UPS driver,

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem -- Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law. She's didn't come to court to answer charges that

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way." There are big nuptials planned on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound or make it worse?
